articles.author: Sue Lannin
articles.title: Wall Street gains ahead of US inflation data, ASX set to rise - ABC News
articles.description: US stocks have risen on again on the back of hopes tonight's consumer inflation data will show price rises have peaked in North America.
articles.content:
US stocks have closed higher again ahead of a key inflation report tonight, which could show that US inflation has peaked. 
<ul><li>The Dow Jones index rose 0.7pc to 32,381, the S&P 500 rose 1pc… [+2947 chars]
